DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim research study enhance smoke cessation outcome among smoker elevate anxiety depression . We compare two group treatment approach : ( 1 ) An educational-supportive psychotherapy standard smoke cessation treatment , ( 2 ) An integrate smoking cessation , anxiety depression management treatment program ( SDAT ) . Both treatment also utilize nicotine replacement therapy .
